casebody.data:
In the Matter of C.S. & C.A.S.
appealed by Respondent, Stanley S. No. 367P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina, Nineteen-B District. March 8, 2007. Terry F. Rose, Smithfield, for Stanley S. Christopher G. Daniel, for Guardian ad Litem. David A. Perez, for Randolph County DSS. Scott Dunn, Asheboro, for Mother, Monica Durham.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of July 2006 by Respondent (Stanley S.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th day of March 2007."
